tx = "Everything seems to go round above my head,
and within my stomach... The feeling is as if
reality itself was indistinguishable from a dream...
should I be concearned about this? maybe seek for 
professional help? or is this to be expected
when you get fired? Time will tell..."
tx
split(tx, split = ' ')
strsplit(tx, split = ' ')
?strsplit
?'regular expression'

?'regular expression'

?'regular expression'

strsplit(tx, split = '[:blank:]', perl = TRUE)

?gsub

?gsub

?gsub
tx_bw = strsplit(tx, split = '[ \n]')

gsub('[?.]', '', tx_bw)
?gsub
vec_gsub = Vectorize(gsub)

vec_gsub('[?.,:;!¿¡]', '', tx_bw)

nchar(tx_bw_np)
?simplyfy
?as.vector

tx_bw_np = as.vector(vec_gsub('[?.,:;!¿¡]', '', tx_bw), mode = character)

n = nchar(tx_bw_np)
